channel.title: irl on Gerald's Website
channel.description: Recent content in irl on Gerald's Website

item.title: Japan is really something
item.description: I’ve lived in Japan for a year before for work purposes. This time, I’m going to stay for a couple of years to accompany my wife as she does her Masters. I thought that it would be fun to list down some random things that I personally find interesting about Japan, since this place is kind of like my 3rd home at this point.
